description.full: The BIGS elevates America's favorite pastime to new heights with larger-than-life ballparks, heroic gameplay and incredible player models. Setting this MLB® experience apart from anything you’ve ever seen before are spectacular power-ups, stunning special effects, and a totally unique career mode. Featuring fantastic pitching, batting and fielding animations, The BIGS brings new meaning to the term highlight reel!
